images.name: 00.JPG
images.description: This shot of my roof on a summer day is still one of my favorites for its strong line and contrast.

images.name: 01.png
images.description: The lack of color and unusual camera angle combine for a dramatic photograph.

images.name: 02.png
images.description: My first use of a film camera adds a warm fuzz to the image.

images.name: 02_1.png
images.description: The use of blank space creates another dramatic shot of Stadium.

images.name: 03.png
images.description: The isolated color of this natural arrangement inspired by Andy Goldsworthy makes it memorable.

images.name: 04.png
images.description: This close-up shot of my violin under controlled lighting brings out the texture and contrast.

images.name: 05.png
images.description: A simple arrangement of colored paper still manages to astound due to its use of the Rule of Thirds.

images.name: 07.png
images.description: Given the phrase "Share Your Table," I captured the warmth and color of a table set for a feast.

images.name: 08.png
images.description: An artfully framed shot of my dog, edited heavily to improve coloring.

images.name: 09.png
images.description: The ski slopes of Winthrop are cast in a striking silhouette from the sun behind.

images.name: 10.png
images.description: The diffused light of misty rain paired with precise composition show the magic of Tacoma.

images.name: 10_1.png
images.description: Light from a window shows the texture on my dog's face.
